qas.question: How can you protest against big companies in a non violent way?

answers.text: illegal boycotts, refusals to pay taxes, draft dodging, distributed denial-of-service attacks, and sit-ins

qas.question: What did denial of service attacks make it harder for The Plowshares organization to do?
What is using moral dialogue considered when not following the law?

plausible_answers.text: padlocking the gates and using sickles to deflate one of the large domes covering two satellite dishes

qas.question: What action did Brownlee take against GCSB Waihopai that caused them to close temporarily?
What method does the government use to get their issue heard?

plausible_answers.text: by their conscientious aim to engage in moral dialogue
